pkgmetadata.longdescription: SDK for yeswehack# Build from source`make build` (or `poetry build`)# Installation## Developer### Requirements- [`poetry`](https://python-poetry.org/) (`pip install poetry`)### Installation`make install` (or `poetry install`): creates a virtualenv and install dependencies## From pip```pip install yeswehack```## From wheel```pip install path/to/yeswehack-wheel.whl```# Getting starting with YesWeHack Python SDK## API ModuleIn this python module, we define object mapping to YesWeHack API Object.
